script: Devi stands in a minimalist studio, radiant with a soft, flirty smile. A stylist adjusts her statement chandelier earrings, then flashes of camera light burst as she poses confidently. Cut to her walking gracefully, showcasing the luxurious oversized blazer paired with fitted trousers. Quick close-ups focus on the intricate details of her earrings before she glances at the camera with a warm gaze, embodying modern glamour.

### Luxury Moodboard Notes

The current luxury fashion direction embraces a soft and radiant aesthetic, channeling an ethereal grace while maintaining a sense of modern glamour. Silhouettes are refined yet fluid, featuring flowing garments in premium materials such as silk and satin, paired with luxurious wool and cashmere layering.
